isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT, CONNECTING RODS AND PISTONS - Connecting Rods, Pistons and Piston Rings - Check Width of Top and Intermediate Compression Ring Groove

svcproc.title: Check Width of Top and Intermediate Compression Ring Groove

note.para: The top compression ring groove is a keystone design which requires measurement over gauge pins to determine groove wear.

figure.caption: Measuring the Width of the Top Compression Ring Groove

step1.para: Install the 3 mm (0.1150 in) gauge pins from the piston groove wear gauge pin set into the groove to be measured. Make sure the gauge pins are parallel.
Use an outside micrometer to measure the piston diameter over the gauge pins.
If the measurement over the gauge pin is not within specifications, excessive piston groove wear exists. The piston must be replaced with a new piston.
Repeat the procedure for the intermediate compression ring groove.
